data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Portland.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Jair Marrufo awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Portland.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Portland.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 11, Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Portland's area.
Los Angeles drive forward but Diego Rossi is judged offside.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 13, Free kick Portland.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jair Marrufo signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 17, Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 17, In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Portland's Jeremy Ebobisse gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Free kick for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
In the minute 21, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Portland.
Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
Eryk Williamson scores to make it 0-1 at Banc of California Stadium.
Great play from Felipe Mora to set up the goal.
In the minute 26, Jair Marrufo awards Portland a goal kick.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Los Angeles.
In the minute 29, Bradley Wright-Phillips for Los Angeles drives towards goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Los Angeles's Jose Cifuentes breaks free at Banc of California Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Francisco Ginella gets his shot on target but fails to score for Los Angeles.
In the minute 35, In Los Angeles, Los Angeles push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Mark Anthony Kaye grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 37, That's a fine assist from Bradley Wright-Phillips.
Free kick Los Angeles.
At Banc of California Stadium, Portland are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Portland.
Goal! Diego Rossi gives Los Angeles a 2-1 lead in Los Angeles.
Brian Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Jair Marrufo signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 44, Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Los Angeles, Jose Cifuentes of Los Angeles is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! Bradley Wright-Phillips extends Los Angeles's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 45, Francisco Ginella with an assist there.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-2 through a header from Jeremy Ebobisse.
Jorge Villafana with an assist there.
The second-half is underway at Banc of California Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Felipe Mora (Portland) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 46, Giovanni Savarese is making the team's first substitution at Banc of California Stadium with Yimmi Chara replacing Marvin Loria.
The away team have replaced Chris Duvall with Pablo Bonilla. This is the second substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Portland just outside Los Angeles's area.
In the minute 50, Dario Zuparic (Portland) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 54, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jose Cifuentes.
In the minute 58, Los Angelesâ€™s Jose Cifuentes is on his feet again at Banc of California Stadium.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 59, Portland needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 61, Can Portland capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Portland apply pressure at Banc of California Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Diego Valeri but the strike hits the bar!
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
In the minute 63, Free kick in a good position for Los Angeles!
Brian Rodriguez (Los Angeles) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 65, Free kick Los Angeles.
Andy Najar is replacing Francisco Ginella for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 67, Los Angeles push upfield but Jair Marrufo quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Portland.
Jaroslaw Niezgoda is replacing Felipe Mora for the away team.
In the minute 69, Jair Marrufo signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Diego Valeri of Portland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 70, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Portland.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Bonilla (Portland) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Diego Rossi of Los Angeles gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jair Marrufo awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Portland have a goal kick.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Free kick Portland.
Throw-in for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 80, Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a second substitution, with Danny Musovski replacing Bradley Wright-Phillips.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
Jair Marrufo signals a Portland throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 81, The home team replace Brian Rodriguez with Eduard Atuesta.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 83, Jose Cifuentes (Los Angeles) has received a yellow card from Jair Marrufo.
Portland's Diego Valeri misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
In the minute 85, Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a fourth substitution, with Andy Polo replacing Diego Valeri.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 88, Portland have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Los Angeles drives forward and Diego Rossi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
Jair Marrufo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Los Angeles's Jose Cifuentes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portland defender.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Los Angeles are pushing forward but Eduard Atuesta's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-2.
Goal! Danny Musovski extends Los Angeles's lead to 4-2.
Mark Anthony Kaye instrumental with a fine assist.
